case.title: Ms 007 Looking for James - 44 (London)
case.text: Single, Full Figured, American Black Female. Looking for Life partner. I am smart, funny, honest, disease free, cute and tall. Looking for European male at least 6 feet or taller. Smart, honest, disease free, nice looking. Working and family oriented. I am 44 and I have grown I don't mind if you have children. I am relocating to UK Lets see what happens, Only Serious Men please. Color is not an issue.
